name: Hoops World
description:
It's just hoops... Or is it?



Relax and shoot some hoops in a variety of scenic locations. Choose from basic courts, or courts with challenging trick shots & long shots!

Immerse yourself in the world of first-person basketball, where players can test their shooting abilities on a range of courts.

Drawing inspiration from iconic shooter titles that included hidden (and often overlooked) basketball mini-games and physics-based novelty features, Hoops World allows you to discover the joy of sinking hoops and trick-shots in unique locations such as indoor courts, stadiums, beaches, and more!

Transforming a classic, quirky gaming element into a full-fledged FPS basketball experience, Hoops World is a great way to relax in your own world!



Along with various basketball courts and locations, Hoops World includes physics-based fun!

Drive vehicles around various racetracks, drifting and sliding around a variety of scenic locations in between sinking hoops and exploring!

Find many different physics-based objects to play around with. Hoops World is your world - play any way you like!
